result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Orlando C Robinson in court with attorney Erin Joy Preston.  Defendant Orlando C Robinson in custody.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.
Defense indicates that parties are finalizing the offer and Ms. Preston believes that this matter will resolve. This deft is represented by Atty Reed in another file. 

BTC: The offer is to be reduced to writing prior to the COP date and distributed to all parties.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 19, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on November 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Orlando C Robinson in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Defendant Orlando C Robinson in custody.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.
The attorney appointed to Mr. Robinson's other case has not yet presented the global offer to him which would encompass this case. Parties ask that this matter be taken off the trial calendar to give both attorney's time to discuss same with the defendant.

BTC: matter to be taken off the trial calendar. If the matter will resolve, the COP date may be moved up  Status conference scheduled for November 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Orlando C Robinson in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Defendant Orlando C Robinson in custody.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.
